thread.title: Ray Witherspoon
thread.title_full: Pure Diesel Power reviewed by Ray Witherspoon

author: Ray Witherspoon
title: Ray Witherspoon
text: There customer service was outstanding along with tech support! There where no dumb questions that I could ask. I'm not very knowledgeable on Cummins but, there tech support worked with me and are helping me not to over buy parts that are not needed for my build! Thanks guys and I would proudly recommend you to others!! Ray Witherspoon
